sentences.en: Com pare the standard deviations from the two tests.
sentences.cn: 比较两组测试值的标准偏差.

sentences.en: Compare clip, pare , prune , trim and shave.
sentences.cn: 试比较clip、pare 、 prune 、 trim、shave这几个词.

sentences.en: First, pare the rind from the lemon.
For years, analysts have urged GM to pare its brands.
sentences.cn: 多年来分析师一直在敦促通用汽车精减品牌.

sentences.en: Happy New age to the globle's prime pare notnts!
sentences.cn: 祝世纪上最好的爸妈节日愉快!

sentences.en: He took out a slab of cheese, pared off a slice and ate it hastily.
sentences.cn: 他拿出厚厚的一块奶酪，切下一片急匆匆地吃了。

sentences.en: I moved immediately after the election to pare down radically the size of the executive branch.
sentences.cn: 大选后,我立即采取行动,大肆削减行政部门的人员.

sentences.en: No. 5 strain: Ser →89→ Ala in ParE.
sentences.cn: 鸡5号菌株 ParE 在89位丝氨酸变为丙氨酸(Ser-89→Ala).

sentences.en: Pare off the rind from the orange using a sharp knife.
sentences.cn: 用锋利的刀子削去橙子皮.

sentences.en: Pare the brown skin from the meat with a very sharp knife.
sentences.cn: 用一把非常锋利的刀将褐色的皮从肉上剥去。

sentences.en: Pare the rind from the lemons.
The country’s defences have been pared to the bone (= reduced as far as possible ) .
sentences.cn: 该国的防御能力已被削减至最低水平。

sentences.en: The firm has not been able to pare costs fast enough to match competitors.
sentences.cn: 那家公司一直没能迅速削减开支，难以与对手抗衡。

sentences.en: The governor's campaign fund could be pared down to $500.
sentences.cn: 州长竞选活动基金可能会被削减到$500。

sentences.en: The luxury tax won't really do much to pare down the budget deficit.
sentences.cn: 奢侈品税其实对削减预算赤字并不会有多少帮助。

sentences.en: We were asked to pare down our budget.
You can becoming an excellent teacIT tutoring your pare notnts.
sentences.cn: 教爸妈的过程中你会成了一名出色的教师.

sentences.en: You never pare the apple, sometimes even without washing.
sentences.cn: 你吃苹果从来不削皮, 甚至不洗.

trans.tran_en: When you pare something, or pare part of it off or away, you cut off its skin or its outer layer
to reduce the amount, number, or size of something as much as you can
